body: Is it me or did someone use King Crimson at panel 9?

Just got caught up to page 337.  First off, I agree with others that Tim (the MC) became too possessive of Denise when he not only gave her off to his friend, but ended up getting Kelly, who’s a rather easy girl and very sexy in her own right.  Since all he seems to want  is sex, he shouldn’t have problem anymore whenever Kelly’s involved, so it doesn’t make sense for now that he’s obsessing over Denise specifically as if they had some deeper relationship.

That said, Tim’d sexual frustration in general  seems understandable, I mean he’s had to socialize with two hot women who dress like sluts and cock-tease him almost on a regular basis, and Denise doesn’t really fight back all that much if you go back and read it, and take into consideration when she admitted to herself that she actually likes it.

I’m honestly not that surprised that Tim has all but snapped, since Denise and even Haley aren’t helping matters.
the mc is rapey but i like the art

Finished the current chapters. I’m disgusted with the mc. Really disgusted. Why is rape not tagged. He raped and raped and raped and raped and raped. I can’t fap to this shii.

On 234 now, the mc is possessive and delusional and his male friend got played. They’re both clowns and I don’t like either. This is officially the first hentai/doujinshi I’ve watched that I was so disgusted that I didn’t fap to. F this(so far)

I HAD to make an account after I saw this. THE MC IS BSing me how can he trade a girl for a girl then get upset and possessive over the girl he traded!? HE was the one that got her involved and this wouldn’t have happened if it wasn’t for him so can he stfu and stop trying to claim both of them? Also I’m only on 176 haven’t finished

Magicman also hangs out in the comments too and the memes, so go show some support bc this dudes vowed to finish translating the series no matter how shitty it(the story) gets bc things are getting shitty in the latest release.
